patthana8.47:1.1_0: Naupādinnaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.47:2.1_0: Naanupādinnaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.47:2.1_1: Naanupādinnaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.47:2.1_2: Naanupādinnaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naupādinno ca naanupādinno ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana8.47:3.1_0: Naupādinnañca naanupādinnañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana8.47:4.1_0: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… āsevane ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
